original_text: They went to speak to Zerubbabel and to the leaders of the Israelite families. They said, ‘Let us help you to build the temple. We also want to worship your God. We have lived in this country since Esarhaddon, king of Assyria, brought us here. All this time we have made sacrifices to your God.’
korean_text: 스룹바벨과 족장들에게 나아와 이르되 우리도 너희와 함께 건축하게 하라 우리도 너희 같이 너희 하나님을 찾노라 앗수르 왕 에살핫돈이 우리를 이리로 오게 한 날부터 우리가 하나님께 제사를 드리노라 하니

sentences.original_text: They went to speak to Zerubbabel
and to the leaders of the Israelite families
They said, 'Let us help you to build the temple
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 말하기를, '우리가 당신이 성전을 짓는 것을 도우겠습니다'

sentences.original_text: We also want to worship your God
sentences.korean_translation: 우리 또한 당신의 하나님을 경배하고 싶습니다

sentences.original_text: We have lived in this country
since Esarhaddon, king of Assyria, brought us here
sentences.korean_translation: 앗수르의 왕 에사르핫돈이 우리를 이곳으로 데려온 이래로

sentences.original_text: we have made sacrifices to your God
